titleStmt.title: England's call to thankfulness for her great deliverance from popery and arbitrary power by the glorious conduct of the Prince of Orange (now King of England) in the year 1688 in a sermon preach'd in the parish-church of Almer in Dorsetshire on February the 14th, 1688/9 / by John Olliffe ...
titleStmt.author: Ollyffe, John, 1647-1717.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
